means: （指车辆）在积水的路面上打滑

sentence.Network_en: Then we shoved it across the tank like an aquaplane.
sentence.Network_cn: 然后我们把它像滑水板一样猛推过水池.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent. (originally US): from Latin aqua 'water' + plane

means.word_mean: 1. a board that is pulled by a speedboat as a person stands on it and skims over the top of the water
1. of cars: to rise up onto a thin film of water between the tires and road so that there is no more contact with the road

auth_sentence.content: It was difficult because if there is too much standing water we can't go out, we aquaplane pretty quickly.

auth_sentence.content: When it gets too wet, it doesn't matter what speed you go, you will aquaplane.
